title: Norman McLaren: Selected films. Creative process (Collectors edition) [DVD]
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/McLaren, Norman, 1914-
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animators
abstract: Disc 1- Documentary 'Creative Process: Norman McLaren' (1990, 117 min). Disc 2- Selected Films (total running time 114 min): 'Boogie-Doodle (1940, 3 mins)--Le Merle (1958, 5 min)--A Chairy Tale (1957, 10 min)--A Phantasy (1952, 7 min)--Neighbours (1952, 8 min)--Lines Horizontal (1961, 6 min)--Mosaic (1965, 5 min)--New York Lightboard Record (excerpt) (1961, 3 min)--Begone Dull Care (1949, 8 min)--Pas de Deux (1967, 13 min)--Blinkity Blank (1955, 5 min)--Synchromy (1971, 7 min)--Animated Motion No. 5 (1978, 7 min)--Narcissus (1983, 22 min). 2 booklets entitled 'Norman McLaren: On the Creative Process' in French and English.
description: This collector's edition DVD box set features 14 of famed filmmaker Norman McLaren's animated works; a documentary entitled 'Creative Process: Norman McLaren' which explores his philosophy on cinema and creativity; and a companion 104 page booklet in French and English that contains technical notes on the featured films and extends the ideas espoused in 'Creative Process'. The documentary and many of the featured films are also available on other formats in the ACMI collection.
